summary: The diff implements the requested visual/styling changes (logo light-green badge, softer off-white typography, and subtle entrance/hover animations) and indicates removal of Caffeine credit and heart usage. However, it also introduces multiple unrequested functional/content changes (e.g., filtering/removing the “Deals” menu category, WhatsApp ordering + variant dialog, new icons/docs/config tweaks), some of which may violate the constraint to not change existing menu content.

hallucinated_features.description: Filtering out/removing the “Deals” menu category (content change rather than styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits changes to styling/decoration/animations and forbids changing existing menu item names/prices/content text; filtering/removing a category changes rendered content.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx ("Filter out \"Deals\" category as a defensive measure")

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded WhatsApp ordering functionality including variant selection dialog and link-building utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest only asked for styling/color/animation adjustments and footer/logo tweaks.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom TikTok icon SVG added to the app.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements (REQ-62 to REQ-65).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed map preview behavior to embed Google Maps with fallback logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of current BuildRequest scope (only footer/logo/colors/animations).

hallucinated_features.description: Updated menu item images to Ultra HD 4K paths and added related documentation files.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest focuses on UI styling/credits/logo/colors/animations, not asset upgrades or documentation additions.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/content/business.ts": updated to use Ultra HD 4K resolution paths)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an empty placeholder hook file for React Query.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also potentially conflicts with “no backend changes are required” (even though it’s frontend-only, it’s unrelated scope).

hallucinated_features.description: Changed build tooling/configuration (PostCSS config) and enabled dark mode by default in index.html / updated favicon.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-62–REQ-65; these are project/config/entrypoint adjustments beyond the described UI tweaks.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/index.html": dark mode enabled by default, favicon link changed)
